title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, October 23, 2021
description: Today is the 60th birthday of author Laurie Halse Anderson who writes books for children and young adults on challenging topics. Books such as “Speak” and “Chains”.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the 60th birthday of author Laurie Halse Anderson who writes books for children and young adults on challenging topics. Books such as “Speak” and “Chains”.
